name: multilingual-translator
description: Translates technical documentation to any language while preserving markdown formatting, code blocks, and technical accuracy
author: Physical AI Book Team
purpose: This subagent enables documentation to be accessible in multiple languages by using LLM-based translation that understands technical context. Unlike generic translation tools, it preserves code blocks, technical terms, and markdown structure perfectly.

source_directory.description: Path to source documentation directory containing markdown files

llm_provider.description: LLM provider to use for translation

model.description: Specific model to use for translation

preserve_technical_terms.description: Whether to keep technical terms in English

workflow.description: Recursively scan source directory for all .md files
workflow.implementation: Use pathlib.Path.rglob('*.md') to find all markdown files

workflow.description: Read each markdown file with UTF-8 encoding
Use LLM to translate content to target language

llm_prompt.system: You are a professional translator specializing in technical documentation. Translate the following content from English to {target_language}.
instructions: Maintain ALL markdown formatting exactly (headers, lists, code blocks, links, images)
Do NOT translate code blocks - keep code in English
Do NOT translate technical terms (ROS 2, Python, API, Docker, etc.)
Do NOT translate URLs and links
Do NOT translate file paths and commands
Translate all explanatory text, headers, and descriptions
Use appropriate technical terminology in target language where available
Maintain right-to-left (RTL) directionality for RTL languages (Arabic, Urdu, Hebrew)
Keep the same document structure and formatting

workflow.description: Ensure translation quality and formatting integrity
checks: Check that code blocks are preserved
Ensure markdown headers are properly formatted
Confirm technical terms remain in English

workflow.description: Save translated content maintaining directory structure
workflow.implementation: Create output directory structure mirroring source, write files with UTF-8 encoding
Print file count, success/failure status, output directory path

translated_docs_directory.description: Path to directory containing translated documentation

target_language.description: Language the content was translated to

usage_example.description: Run the translation script to generate Urdu documentation
usage_example.expected_output: Creates docs-urdu/ directory with translated content

supported: any language supported by the LLM

can_be_used_by: Any documentation project (Docusaurus, MkDocs, GitBook, etc.)
customization_options: Customize which technical terms to preserve
Adjust LLM prompts for specific domains
Add custom glossaries for domain-specific terms

benefits.for_readers: Access documentation in their native language with proper technical context
benefits.for_writers: Reach global audience without manual translation work
benefits.performance: Pre-generation means instant page loads with zero runtime costs
benefits.seo: Translated content is indexed by search engines for better discoverability
benefits.offline: Works without internet connection once generated

quality_features.technical_accuracy: Preserves code blocks and technical terms exactly
quality_features.context_awareness: LLM understands technical context unlike generic translators
quality_features.markdown_integrity: Maintains all formatting including headers, lists, links, images
quality_features.rtl_support: Properly handles right-to-left languages (Arabic, Urdu, Hebrew)
quality_features.consistency: Same translation every time (deterministic with low temperature)

docusaurus.description: Easily integrates with Docusaurus multi-instance docs
docusaurus.setup: Add docs-{language} plugin instance to docusaurus.config.ts
docusaurus.navigation: Use custom TranslateButton component for seamless language switching
